org.pikater.web.vaadin.gui.server.components.forms.validators

Class NumberRangeValidator<N extends java.lang.Number>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pikater.web.vaadin.gui.server.components.forms.validators.NumberRangeValidator<N>
  • Type Parameters:
    N - The number type. Integer, Float or Double.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.vaadin.data.Validator, java.io.Serializable

    public class NumberRangeValidator<N extends java.lang.Number>
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.vaadin.data.Validator
    Common range validator for numbers. Any number of ranges can be added and validation will validate against the highest minimum and lowest maximum found.
    Author:
    SkyCrawl
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
